class.name: PIXI.JsonLoader

parameters.name: url
parameters.help: The url of the JSON file

parameters.name: crossorigin
parameters.help: Whether requests should be treated as crossorigin

class.help: The json file loader is used to load in JSON data and parse it\nWhen loaded this class will dispatch a 'loaded' event\nIf loading fails this class will dispatch an 'error' event

private.name: onJSONLoaded
private.help: Invoked when the JSON file is loaded.

private.name: onLoaded
private.help: Invoked when the json file has loaded.

public.name: baseUrl
public.help: [read-only] The base url of the bitmap font data

public.name: crossorigin
public.help: Whether the requests should be treated as cross origin

public.name: loaded
public.help: [read-only] Whether the data has loaded yet

public.name: url
public.help: The url of the bitmap font data
